channel.title: RuneScape Future Updates
channel.description:
Discuss what you think the updates of Runescape should be, what would you like to see?
i was thinking about Horses Lol:p that's jut an oppinion though.

item.title: RuneScape Future Updates
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote="_ikram, post:34, topic:281630"]Yeh, most likley

who was jagex’s old CEO and whos the new one?[/quote]

Old;

Jagex appoints PayPal CEO to accelerate international growth 23/10/2007

Jagex Ltd, the online games developer, announced that Geoff Iddison, the former European CEO of PayPal, has joined the company as CEO. Iddison has extensive experience in leading international e-commerce-based businesses.

New;

Jagex Appoints Mark Gerhard as Chief Executive Officer 30/01/2009

Jagex today announced the appointment of Mark Gerhard as the new Chief Executive Officer following the resignation of Geoff Iddison earlier this month. Mark Gerhard, who currently serves as the Chief Technical Officer at Jagex, has been appointed to lead the company from 1st February.

http://www.jagex.com/corporate/Press/pressRelease.ws

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Future Updates
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

_ikram:

Agreed with Fangg, Jagex soon will start to focus more on mechscape, RuneScape can’t go on forever, and soon we wont be playing and making RSPS, it will me MechScape, wow.

No. Jagex have a completely different team working with Mechscape, Jagex have what, 400+ employees? It won’t effect Runescape at all.

Awhile ago, in an interview, I think it was Jagex’s old CEO at the time, said Jagex will be focusing mainly on Runescape for the next 5 years, this was said in 07, or 08, not sure.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:26, topic:281630”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=372058.msg2810998#msg2810998 date=1243988074]

more stoof to farm

There’s tons of shit to farm.
[/quote]
not after 85 farming[/quote]

Eh, most skills drop off at late 70s, or early 80s, but Jagex is too busy adding more mini-games to make it easier to train instead of adding more things to train skills with in the higher levels.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Future Updates
item.dc:creator: @Range_This Range This
item.description:
@Range_This wrote:

A boat? Too far. A horse would be good but honestly; would you really want to spend money to ride a horse around a fucking game? Oh I know, why don’t you just search for “Pony Riders” and play that instead? You can get membership for $2.95, you can change your pony to pink AND purple with membership, and you can also race in secret pony clubs!

No, honestly. Horses? Boats? Cars? Why would they bring out cars? They haven’t even got to the horse stage yet, Honestly, bumper-cars? I’d rather run around in the PvP world mauling losers thinking they own you.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Future Updates
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Whats so bad about horses? or boats? i can understand flying cars etc…

item.title: RuneScape Future Updates
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

After reading all of the replies, it made me realize why all RSPS fail and RuneScape is the only true good server for the RuneScape Client. All of you who posted things like cars, horses, buggies, go die in a hole. You’re fucking retarded and are too lazy to do shit on RuneScape that requires movement, and want to ruin the game.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Future Updates
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“pure ess ftw, post:21, topic:281630”][quote author=_ikram link=topic=372058.msg2810359#msg2810359 date=1243962621]

Horses FTW:P

and cars?

Thats pushing it… Runescape is based in the medievl times, not the Ghetto:P
[/quote]
this may be true, but civilization’s evolve. Runescape has future things, as well as past things. Why not use bumpercars now? yeah, ride around with your runescape charactervroom! vroom!
while a guy with a lazer gun comes up and is like starwars sound effects cause he is stupid then kills the guy and loots him for his car and jacks it.- thats the future…
OR-MORE REALISTIC-
going to turn into a W.O.W. failure like it has trying to be if you saw the updates…but 1st part was serous at the top part…Why not cow’s blood? way to cure sickness-bleed yourself. :D[/quote]

That’s too childish and retarded.

Read full topic
